actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to prohibit any person engaged in the business of marketing or distributing natural gas, propane, butane, or electricity, from terminating service to any customer unless prior written notice is given to the local law enforcement and welfare agencies.

summary.text: Prohibits any person engaged in the business of marketing or distributing of natural gas, propane, butane, or electricity, from terminating service to any customer unless prior written notice is given to the local law enforcement and welfare agencies. Provides for penalties of fines up to $20,000 for knowing violations of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit any person engaged in the business of marketing or distributing natural gas, propane, butane, or electricity, from terminating service to any customer unless prior written notice is given to the local law enforcement and welfare agencies.
